name: Whale Watching Tour
description: Exciting tours to see whales in their natural habitat.

name: John F. Kennedy Hyannis Museum
description: Museum dedicated to John F. Kennedy's time spent on Cape Cod.

name: Cape Cod National Seashore
description: 40 miles of pristine sandy beach, marshes, ponds, and uplands supporting diverse species.

name: Pilgrim Monument
description: Commemorative tower offering panoramic views of Provincetown and the surrounding area.

name: Woods Hole Science Aquarium
description: The oldest public aquarium in the United States, featuring marine life from Northeast and Middle Atlantic waters.

name: Heritage Museums & Gardens
description: 100 acres of gardens and nature trails with a vintage carousel and classic car museum.

name: Cape Cod Rail Trail
description: 22-mile paved trail for cycling, walking, and jogging through six Cape Cod towns.

name: Edward Gorey House
description: Museum dedicated to the life and works of the eccentric author and illustrator Edward Gorey.

name: Cape Cod Museum of Natural History
description: Nature education center with exhibits on local flora and fauna, and nature trails.

name: Chatham Lighthouse
description: Historic lighthouse offering guided tours and beautiful ocean views.

name: Wellfleet Drive-In Theatre
description: One of the last drive-in theaters in the country, offering a nostalgic movie-watching experience.

name: Cahoon Museum of American Art
description: Museum showcasing American art from the 18th century to the present, with a focus on Cape Cod artists.

name: Cape Cod Potato Chip Factory
description: Take a self-guided tour of the factory where the famous Cape Cod Potato Chips are made.

name: Monomoy National Wildlife Refuge
description: Wildlife refuge protecting migratory birds and gray seals, offering hiking and wildlife viewing.

name: Whydah Pirate Museum
description: Interactive museum featuring artifacts from the Whydah shipwreck, the only authenticated pirate shipwreck in the world.

name: Cape Cod Lavender Farm
description: Beautiful lavender farm offering walking trails, a gift shop, and stunning purple fields in bloom.

name: Mashpee Commons
description: Open-air shopping center with a variety of shops, restaurants, and entertainment options.

name: Sandwich Glass Museum
description: Museum showcasing the town's rich history in glassmaking with live glassblowing demonstrations.

name: Cape Cod Beer
description: Local brewery offering tours, tastings, and a glimpse into the craft beer-making process.
